text: ma yanbaghi li'ahad min albashar 'an yunzzil allah ealayh kitabah wayajealuh hkmana bayn khalaqah wykhtarh nbyaan, thuma yaqul llnas: aebuduni min dun allh, wlkn yqwl: kunuu hukama' fqha' eulama' bima kuntum tueallimwnh ghayrikum min wahy allah teala, wabima tdrswnh minh hfzana welmana wfqhana
